sentences.sContent: It is indisputable that birds are harbouring this illness.
sentences.sCn: 无可争辩的是，鸟类携带着这种疾病。

synos.tran: 明白的；无争论之余地的

remMethod.val: in (不， 无) + disputable (有争议的) → 毫无争议的， 不可争辩的

trans.tranCn: 无争论之余地的， 明白的
trans.tranOther: If you say that something is indisputable, you are emphasizing that it is true and cannot be shown to be untrue
